group_1.textRight: What have you been doing here?

group_1.textLeft: Yachiyo-san...
Mirrors has started to move.

group_1.textRight: .......[wait:1.0][chara:100201:lipSynch_1]Move?

group_1.textLeft: You see, one of the Mirror Witch's Familiars reached@maturity in this area.
We can't leave a new Mirror Witch's Labyrinth unattended...
So as soon as I realized what happened, I tried to@inform everyone.
But the original Witch's signature suddenly got @larger...
I had to go and head it off right away.

group_1.textRight: Its signature got larger...@Does that mean it was moving this way?

group_1.textLeft: Most likely, yes.

group_1.textRight: So the Coordinator's been here, @holding it back, this entire time?!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?
But Endless Mirrors was still over in the Mirror @Mansion just a while ago...

group_1.textCenter: But the Coordinator thought the Mirror Witch was@moving closer...

group_1.textRight: How's that supposed to work?

group_1.textLeft: I'm not sure of that myself, either.
But I'm sure I felt the Mirror Witch's magic signature@getting stronger.
And if it found out about Swindlers' Town thanks to @the new Witch it birthed...
I feel like I understand why it would come this way.

group_1.textRight: As far as the Endless Mirrors that Ibuki-san's group@mentioned is concerned...
It makes sense if you think of it as 'the Labyrinth@growing large enough to reach Daito'.
Though that's hardly a comforting thought.@[chara:100201:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:100201:cheek_-1:motion_200][chara:100201:eyeClose_0:lipSynch_1]Were you not able to call for help...?

group_1.textLeft: I mean...
It's near my home town, so I thought I could just go @out here on short notice...
And there's hardly any girls who come near @Swindlers' Road, either.

group_1.textRight: Yeah. Even the local Magical Girls don't come here @very often...

group_1.textLeft: On top of that, I did manage to make a barrier with@Mirrors coins to pen it in...
But I had to constantly stay nearby in order to @maintain it.
Pen it in...?

group_1.textRight: Uh, guys? We picked all those coins up!

group_1.textLeft: Are you serious?!

group_1.textRight: W-w-w-we're sorry! @Was that a bad thing?!
So *that's* what it was...!

group_1.textLeft: Those coins are the cores from the copies made in Endless Mirrors.
So by lining a large number of them up...
I was able to trick the Witch into thinking that its @allies were forming a wall outside.
If the coins were removed... the effect should be@starting to wear off right about now.
Do you think there'll be enough time to pen it in@again...?

group_1.textRight: We'll still need someone to constantly maintain@that barrier.
Are we supposed to just do the same thing if@another familiar matures elsewhere?
What else can we do, then...?

group_1.textLeft: Well, we now have plenty of Magical Girls who can @fight, unlike Mitama.

group_1.textRight: Aha! If we all work together, we might be able to @beat it!

group_1.textLeft: Exactly. If we act fast, we ought to be able to deal @with a weak hatchling!
I'll be going in with you.

group_1.textRight: Adding another person for us to protect doesn't @sound like a good idea to me...

group_1.textLeft: I feel like I can find a chance for us to defeat@the Witch, though.
So let me go with you this time.

group_1.textRight: All right.

group_1.textLeft: Okay, everyone! Let's join forces...

group_1.textRight: And go beat this baby Mirror Witch!

group_1.textLeft: This isn't the time to be having fun with it...
But when you think about it, we're the first Magical@Girls to actually see the Mirror Witch.

group_1.textRight: That's so exciting!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, a little.

group_1.textRight: W-who's there?!

group_1.textLeft: More Familiars?!@[chara:300500:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300500:cheek_-1][chara:300500:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json:motion_0][chara:300500:lipSynch_1]...No, they don't seem like it.

group_1.textRight: Tokiwa-san...!
